alert.note: Alert for Johnston; Wayne; Wilson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 6:22PM EDT until July 07 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Wayne County in central North Carolina... Southwestern Wilson County in central North Carolina... Northeastern Johnston County in central North Carolina... * Until 715 PM EDT. * At 622 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Bailey, or 13 miles northeast of Smithfield, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wilson, Fremont, Micro, Kenly, Lucama, Black Creek, Pikeville, Buckhorn Reservoir and Nahunta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
